attributes.action: Raise the higher rate income tax to £40,000.00
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please raise the higher rate of income tax threshold to £40,000.00.  People who have studied and worked hard to secure well paid employment should not be penalised by the current rate of higher income tax.

The need for taxes is understood, but people should be able to keep more of the money they earn not the Chancellor.

£32,400.00 the current threshold rises by a risable £900.00 next year to £33,300.00.   

The extra money in wage packets will mostly be fed back into the economy by the families concerned and not government initiatives.
